raw_comment:
Notice
- Females reach out to parents more in general
- Huge gap betweeen females and males who reach out by text and by phone or video chat. 

Wonder 
- Does the relationship between parents and young adults affect them reaching out?

Headline - 
Reaching Out: Are Young Women More Attached to Their Parents than Males?
ace_sentences: Females reach out to parents more than males in general.
There is a huge gap between females and males who reach out by text.
There is a huge gap between females and males who reach out by phone.
There is a huge gap between females and males who reach out by video chat.
I wonder whether the relationship between parents and young adults affects reaching out.
The headline is: Reaching Out: Are young women more attached to their parents than males?
